title: Sh*t Show Podcast: Jurassic Park III (2001) LIVE!

media:group.media:title: Sh*t Show Podcast: Jurassic Park III (2001) LIVE!
media:group.media:description:
Finding your son on an island full of dinosaurs is hard. Let's talk about how difficult it was to make Jurassic Park III, from the multiple script revisions that remained unfinished during filming, to a production that director Joe Johnston called 'a living hell.' Recorded live with Reddit Talks: https://www.reddit.com/r/movies/comments/vvako2/making_jurassic_park_iii_was_a_sht_show_reddit/

You can also listen to this episode (and more) in podcast form!

Follow us on Twitter, Instagram, & TikTok: https://linktr.ee/itwasashtshow

In the entertainment world, there are millions of dollars on the line and troubled productions are bound to happen. And we are going to talk about these disastrous, never ending, and sometimes dangerous productions. From the creators of WTF Happened To This Movie?, It Was A Sh*t Show is a video essay/documentary/podcast series looking at some of your favorite films and tv shows, and why they were such a nightmare to make.

Chapters:
00:00 - Teaser
01:17 - Intro
03:59 - Jurassic Park III (2001)
